longBusinessSummary: Muthoot Capital Services Limited, a non-banking finance company, provides fund and non-fund based financial services in India. The company offers two-wheeler, used car, secured business, and loyalty loans; short-term and long-term deposits; and subordinated debts. It serves retail, corporate, and institutional customers through a network of branches. Muthoot Capital Services Limited was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Kochi, India.
